name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"ae832669-7ec2-4df2-8a6d-694b96578a8c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Initialization and Environment Setup","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"db915380-9c5c-486c-894b-18fbb15ee1ae","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group of methods within the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is responsible for establishing and maintaining the analysis environment. Before the complex task of code traversal begins, these functions ensure that all supporting subsystems are correctly instantiated, project-specific paths are normalized, and the Python runtime is appropriately configured. They provide the "stable ground" required for consistent and repeatable analysis results.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0dbc857c-4844-4a8c-802e-444b3cae8113","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"459c38d6-7235-47d9-b7ce-89be4535600e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a9c6f5c-9613-425d-9eb7-f616d394acc1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__(entry_points, package, decy, moduleEntry, precision)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The constructor for the generator. It captures the primary operational parameters—such as which files to start with (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"entry_points","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), the boundaries of the project (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"package","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), and whether to use high-accuracy flow analysis (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"precision","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It immediately triggers the internal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"setUp","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to prepare the machinery.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"87849342-79c3-435c-be76-1c396dd5e277","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"setUp()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The master initializer. It creates fresh instances of every manager in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" folder (Import, Scope, Definition, Class, Module, Change, Return, and Node managers). It also initializes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"gol","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Global Object List) utility, ensuring that settings like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"precision","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are propagated to all components.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fced0564-23e2-4469-ad77-ec15b56efa10","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"reset_counters()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"A maintenance utility that iterates through all discovered scopes and resets their internal counters. This is vital when the generator is performing multiple passes, as it prevents state from one pass from "leaking" into or corrupting the logic of another.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"31842a3a-759f-4207-be32-977c08e7f961","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"remove_import_hooks()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Ensures the stability of the Python environment. During analysis, Jarvis often "hooks" into Python's import system to track dependencies. This method removes those hooks, restoring the interpreter to its original state and preventing unintended side effects.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"619ab272-1492-440d-8cc8-ac86dbc40db4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"_get_mod_name(entry, pkg)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"A path-resolution helper. It converts absolute file paths (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"/home/src/auth/__init__.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") into logical Python namespaces (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). This normalization is crucial because the rest of the engine operates on symbolic namespaces rather than physical file handles.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9dbb4b11-1cc6-40a9-9b99-b3b0ea7e7890","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ad1117a4-ffa8-416a-9b5a-2c54d7514b1b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"616760c6-885d-42e5-8ded-1e18d9087180","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"While these methods are usually called internally during the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" lifecycle, understanding their sequence is key to understanding Jarvis's setup phase:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d05c11ad-6e54-4ff4-abdb-bc2e3cebaaaf","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# The __init__ triggers the environment build
cg = CallGraphGenerator(entry_points=["main.py"], package=".")

# Internally, setUp() has now populated:
# cg.import_manager, cg.def_manager, cg.class_manager, etc.

# After a manual pass, you might refresh the environment:
cg.reset_counters()
cg.remove_import_hooks()","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7e22178f-45d0-4d0d-8c12-4259f45345c8","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d8d6e8ee-da14-43bb-b4f3-501e6c3e51b9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Global Synchronization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By initializing all managers in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"setUp","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", Jarvis ensures that every component is working with the same shared data structures, which is essential for accurate cross-file analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f1c3a6af-3e25-42c5-9142-350760e9bd72","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Safety First","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"remove_import_hooks","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method reflects a "defensive" programming approach, ensuring that even if an analysis fails or finishes, the host system's Python environment remains unpolluted.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"771020a9-cd89-4619-9884-57ca9eb09baa","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Namespace Consistency","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_get_mod_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ensures that regardless of whether a user provides relative or absolute paths, the internal "Definitions" and "Scopes" will always use a canonical Python naming convention.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"58ea6e88-b6c0-4aba-8a41-eccb3b6a6774","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
